discussion_comments.comment_body: While doing so in the future might make sense, I'm not convinced it's the best option *right now*. I think this is a feature that generally would benefit from a lot of testing and even then reliability will always be worse than separate instances. So it's difficult for me to recommend it as a default to anyone. Though I suppose on macOS this is expected, so I'm not opposed to changing the default binding in the future. But I see no reason to do it now.
